thread.title: Ground News - Vice Admiral V Srinivas takes over as chief of Southern Naval Command
thread.title_full: Ground News - Vice Admiral V Srinivas takes over as chief of Southern Naval Command

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Vice Admiral V Srinivas takes over as chief of Southern Naval Command
text:
Summary by Ground News Vice Admiral V Srinivas took charge as the 30th Flag Officer Commanding-in-Chief. He succeeded Vice Admiral M A Hampiholi, who retired after a distinguished four-decade career in the Indian Navy. He is one of only two Indian Navy officers to lead both a frontline warship and a nuclear submarine (INS Chakra) Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Devdiscourse Center High Factuality Vice Admiral V Srinivas takes over as chief of Southern Naval Command Vice Admiral V Srinivas takes over as chief of Southern Naval Command Vice Admiral V Srinivas took charge as the 30th Flag Officer Commanding-in-Chief (FOCINC) of the Southern Naval Command in a ceremonial parade at the naval base here on Sunday. He succeeded Vice Admiral M A Hampiholi, who retired after a distinguished four-decade career in the Indian Navy. Both Vice Admiral Srinivas and his predecessor paid homage at the Venduruthy War memori…
